backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two header‑related UI features with affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS index importing base, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for all major pages and renders RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/branding/UtthanL: Renders the clinic logo SVG with configurable className.
frontend/src/components/contact/GoogleMa: Embeds a Google Maps iframe for the clinic location inside a responsive container.
frontend/src/components/cta/BookAppointm: Button linking to the clinic’s Calendly URL with a calendar icon and styling options.
Builds a mailto link using clinic info and renders a styled email button.
frontend/src/components/cta/MobileSticky: Mobile-only sticky footer CTA linking to Calendly with a large secondary button.
frontend/src/components/home/WhoWeAreSec: Homepage section with image, clinic intro text, and CTA linking to the About page.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying clinic info, links, services list, and Instagram link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, desktop nav links, mobile menu, and appointment button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and outlet content area.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Applies document title, meta description, and optional JSON‑LD on mount.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays a service card with image fallback, icon, brief details, and a link to the service page.
Maps service IDs to Lucide icons and renders the appropriate icon.
frontend/src/content/clinicContent.ts: Provides static structured content for clinic hero, about, values, story, and promotional sections.
frontend/src/content/conditions.ts: Defines condition types and a list of common physiotherapy-related conditions with symptoms and treatments.
frontend/src/content/faq.ts: Contains a list of frequently asked questions and answers for the clinic.
frontend/src/content/reviews.ts: Exports review data, Google rating info, and helper functions for averaging and counting reviews.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service types and a list of physiotherapy services with descriptions, benefits, and metadata.
frontend/src/content/therapists.ts: Provides therapist profiles including qualifications, specialties, experience, and bios.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes related queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for animations, layout, and branding.
frontend/src/lib/clinicInfo.ts: Exports static clinic information and helper functions to format address and phone links.
frontend/src/lib/seoSchema.ts: Generates structured data schemas for local business, services, FAQs, and reviews using clinic and content data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with clinic story, mission, vision, images, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ConditionsPage.tsx: Displays a list of treatable conditions with symptoms and treatment approaches, including SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information, action buttons, map embed, and SEO metadata for the clinic.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders the FAQ page with SEO metadata and a list of expandable question-and-answer items using an accordion.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, trust badges, services, clinic info, and SEO schema for the local business.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single service, including hero, image, benefits, and structured SEO data.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a grid of all physiotherapy services using ServiceCard components.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders patient reviews with SEO review schema and cards displaying testimonials and ratings.
frontend/src/pages/TherapistsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a therapists page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, plugins, and custom design tokens for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, requirements, design updates, and known issues for the clinic website rebuild.
